vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.11.29;
daughter of: Terah (H8646);
sister of: Abraham (H0085), Nahor (H5152H) and Haran (H2039); married to Abraham (H0085);
mother of: Isaac (H3327); also called Sarai at Gen.11.29,30,31; 12.5,11,17; 16.1,2,3,5,6,8; 17.15;
Another name of sa.rah (שָׂרָה "Sarah" H8283)
§ Sarai = "princess"
original name of Sarah the wife of Abram or Abraham
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒萊 这个陰性專有名詞
在希伯來文的意思是 "公主"
"撒拉"的原名, 是"亞伯蘭/亞伯拉罕"的妻子
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
撒莱 这个阴性专有名词
在希伯来文的意思是 "公主"
"撒拉"的原名, 是"亚伯兰/亚伯拉罕"的妻子
